Title: Exposure
Starring:
Douglas Smith 
 Margo Harshman 
 Abraham Rodriguez 
 Ryan Whitney 
 Alex Feldman 
 Kevin McCorkle 
 Gary Poux 
 Chanel Minnifield
Release dates:
October17,2023 ( 2023-10-17 )  ( Newport Beach Film Festival ) 
 July9,2024 ( 2024-07-09 )  (United States)
Production: In October 2023, a psychological thriller film written and directed by Peter Cannon titled Exposure had its world premiere at the Newport Beach Film Festival, with Douglas Smith, Margo Harshman, Abraham Rodriguez, Ryan Whitney, Alex Feldman, Kevin McCorkle, Gary Poux and Chanel Minnifield rounding out the main cast.
Release: Exposure is scheduled to be released in the United States on digital on July 9, 2024.
